item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Please attempt to use grammar, and try refraining from riding your high horse. That "idiots" at the end of your line isn't subtle just because you used strikethrough text, and gives people an excuse to not respond to your post or take it seriously at all.

In regards to the point you were trying to make, I don't like to guess at what it may have been exactly. Whether it was due to a translation of his name, or just due to his characteristics, it's hard to say for sure without asking someone whom actually knows.

item.title: the snakeman page
item.content:encoded: wasent in the show orochimaru a snakeman ? well if true then it shoudent be that idiots
